bot-info.description: Mono was designed with special attention to comfort usability and high customization to make job easier for both server owners and members.
bot-info.title: Mono

role.description: Role you want to get information about

user.description: User you want to get information about. Leave blank to see information about yourself.

set.description: Set new autorole, which will be assigned to user when they join

role.description: Role you want to be set as autorole

autorole.managedRole: This role is managed by bot or integration, I can't use it as autorole!
autorole.cantAccessRole: I can't access this role! Make sure it takes place below any of roles I have.

emoji.description: Emoji you want to get information about

A default emoji. You can use this emoji everywhere on Discord.
[Emojipedia]({{link}})

_data.description: Change the language Mono uses on this server

language.languageChanged: Language set to **English** successfully. It may take some time to update slash commands.

message.description: Link to message you want to add reactions under

role.description: Role you want to be (un)assigned from user when they react

emoji.description: Emoji user has to click on to get this role

list.description: Get list of all reaction roles on this server

message.description: Delete reaction role message and all reaction roles attached to it (message remains)
Reaction role message you want to delete

role.description: Reaction role you want to delete

reaction-roles.managedRole: This role is managed by bot or integration, I can't use it as autorole!
reaction-roles.cantAccessRole: I can't access this role! Make sure it takes place below any of roles I have.
reaction-roles.missingPermissions: I don't have enough permissions to add reactions on this message!
reaction-roles.alreadyExists: This reaction role already exists. Unfortunately, creating multiple identical reaction roles is impossible yet.
reaction-roles.creationDescription: This reaction role message doesn't exist yet! Create one by selecting mode below:

standard.name: Standard
standard.description: User gets role when react and looses it when removes reaction

unique.name: Unique
unique.description: User can choose only one role

addOnly.name: Add Only
addOnly.description: User can get role, but can't loose it

removeOnly.name: Remove only
removeOnly.description: User looses role when react and can't get it back

reaction-roles.noMessages: This server has no reaction role messages yet. Use `/reaction-role create` to create one!
reaction-roles.messageNotFound: Couldn't find that reaction role message
reaction-roles.messageDeleted: Reaction role message has been deleted

_data.description: Ban a user from the server

clean-days.description: Number of days to delete messages for (from 0 to 7)

ban.missingPermissions: I have no permissions to ban this member

_data.description: Kick a user from the server

kick.missingPermissions: I have no permissions to kick this member

_data.description: Bulk delete messages in the current channel

amount.description: Amount of messages to delete (from 1 to 100)

_data.description: Remove user ban on the server

userid.description: Id of user you want to remove ban from

unban.invalidId: Looks like id you provided is invalid. [Where can I find user id?](https://support.discord.com/hc/en-us/articles/206346498-Where-can-I-find-my-User-Server-Message-ID-)
unban.notBanned: User with this id is not banned
unban.unbanned: User with id `{{id}}` has been unbanned

warn.warningNotFound: Couldn't find warning with such id

_data.description: See user warnings on this server

user.description: User whose warnings you want to see

info.description: Get information about modules and enable/disable them.

options.module: Module you want to see information about.

module.moduleEnabled: Module **{{module}}** has been enabled. It may take some time to update slash commands.
module.moduleDisabled: Module **{{module}}** has been disabled. It may take some time to update slash commands.
module.modulesListDescription:
Modules system allows you to use only the Mono functionality that you need.

Select a module below to get detailed information about it and enable or disable it.

name.description: New channel name. Some templates are supported.

limit.description: Set default private room user limit
Number of users that can be in private room (0-99). Type 0 to disable.

hidden.description: Set whether a private room will be hidden by default
Whether a private room will be hidden

locked.description: Set whether a private room will be locked by default

name.description: Whether a private room will be locked

setup.description: Choose private rooms creation channel or create a new one

channel.description: Channel for creating private rooms. Leave blank to create automatically.

name.description: Set new name for your private room

limit.description: Set user limit for your private room
Number of users that can be in private room (0-99). Type 0 to disable.

hidden.description: Set whether your private room will be hidden
Whether a private room will be hidden

locked.description: Set whether your private room will be locked
Whether a private room will be locked

kick.description: Kick user from your private room

transfer.description: Transfer ownership of your private room

user.description: User you want to transfer ownership to

private.cantCreateChannel: I don't have enough permissions to create new channels!
private.defaultNameChanged: Default private room name has been changed
private.defaultLimitChanged: Default private room user limit has been changed to **{{limit}}**
private.defaultLimitDisabled: Default private room user limit has been changed
private.defaultHidden: Private rooms has been set to be **hidden** by default
private.defaultShown: Private rooms has been set to be **shown** by default
private.defaultLocked: Private rooms has been set to be **locked** by default
private.defaultOpened: Private rooms has been set to be **opened** by default
private.mustBeInRoom: You have to be in your private channel to change it's settings
private.notInRoom: You are in voice, but not in private room! You have to be in your private channel to change it's settings
private.notHost: Only host can change private room settings! You may ask them to transfer you permissions using `/private transfer`
private.nameChanged: Private room name has been changed
private.limitChanged: Private room user limit has been changed to **{{limit}}**
private.limitDisabled: Private room user limit has been disabled
private.cantTransferToBot: You can't transfer your private room to bot!
